question: Which missile was testfired by the India successfully?
option1: Quick reaction surface-to-air short range missile (QR-SAM).
answer: Quick reaction surface-to-air short range missile (QR-SAM).
explanation: India successfully test-fired its developed quick reaction surface-to-air short range missile (QR-SAM). It was test fired in a launch complex-3 at the Integrated Test Range (ITR) at Chandipur. The QR-SAM has been developed by the Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO) and other establishments.
